add_library(para_libssl INTERFACE)
add_library(para_libcrypto INTERFACE)

if(ANDROID)
    target_include_directories(para_libssl INTERFACE include/android)
    target_link_libraries(para_libssl INTERFACE ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/prebuilt/android/${CMAKE_ANDROID_ARCH_ABI}/libssl.a)
    target_include_directories(para_libcrypto INTERFACE include/android)
    target_link_libraries(para_libcrypto INTERFACE ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/prebuilt/android/${CMAKE_ANDROID_ARCH_ABI}/libcrypto.a)
elseif(IOS)
    target_include_directories(para_libssl INTERFACE include/ios)
    target_link_libraries(para_libssl INTERFACE ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/prebuilt/ios/libssl.a)
    target_include_directories(para_libcrypto INTERFACE include/ios)
    target_link_libraries(para_libcrypto INTERFACE ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/prebuilt/ios/libcrypto.a)
elseif(APPLE)
	target_include_directories(para_libssl INTERFACE include/mac)
    target_link_libraries(para_libssl INTERFACE ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/prebuilt/mac/libssl.a)
    target_include_directories(para_libcrypto INTERFACE include/mac)
    target_link_libraries(para_libcrypto INTERFACE ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/prebuilt/mac/libcrypto.a)
elseif(WIN32)
    target_include_directories(para_libssl INTERFACE include/win32)
    target_include_directories(para_libcrypto INTERFACE include/win32)
	
	if( CMAKE_SIZEOF_VOID_P EQUAL 8 )
		SET(SSL_DASM_FLAGS "x64")
	else()
		SET(SSL_DASM_FLAGS "x86")
	endif()
	
	target_link_libraries(para_libssl INTERFACE ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/prebuilt/win32/${SSL_DASM_FLAGS}/libssl.lib)
    target_link_libraries(para_libcrypto INTERFACE ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/prebuilt/win32/${SSL_DASM_FLAGS}/libcrypto.lib)
elseif(LINUX)
	target_include_directories(para_libssl INTERFACE include/linux)
    target_link_libraries(para_libssl INTERFACE ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/prebuilt/linux/64-bit/libssl.a)
    target_include_directories(para_libcrypto INTERFACE include/linux)
    target_link_libraries(para_libcrypto INTERFACE ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/prebuilt/linux/64-bit/libcrypto.a)
endif()
